item.title: “Demand for AIIMS Raichur not answered at all”: Karnataka Health Minister slams Centre

item.title: Four, including three women, booked for assaulting woman in Raichur district
item.description:
<![CDATA[The Raichur District Police have registered a case against four people, including three women, for assaulting a 28-year-old woman after tying her hands up with a rope in Jalahalli village of Deodurg taluk, Raichur district.
The victim identified as Dandamma Ramanna Sunagar is a native of Jalahalli. The accused also attacked the victim’s mother when she tried to save her daughter.

item.title: New railwayy zone sparks discontent in Kalyana Karnataka
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur: The decision to incorporate Raichur and Yadgir districts into the South Coastal Railway zone , headquartered in Visakhapatnam, at a distance of 800km, has sparked widespread public discontent.Advocates in the Kalyana Karnataka region call for a specific railway zone to be established in Kalaburagi.
